data.title: Auth0: Secure access for everyone. But not just anyone.
data.description: Rapidly integrate authentication and authorization for web, mobile, and legacy applications so you can focus on your core business.
data.content:
Auth0: Secure access for everyone. But not just anyone.
===============
   

[Auth0 Plans Just Got an Upgrade Learn more →](https://auth0.com/blog/auth0-plans-got-an-upgrade/)

Secure access for

everyone


=============================

But not

just anyone


======================

Get started

![Image 3: Login-box](https://cdn.auth0.com/website/website/homepage/hero/login-box.svg)

Auth0 is an easy to implement, adaptable authentication and authorization platform
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Basically, we make your login box awesome. Learn about our latest innovations:

[EARLY ACCESS ### Auth for GenAI Enjoy securing your GenAI apps with the developer experience Auth0 is known for. Join the waitlist ↗](https://www.auth0.ai/)[NOw generally available ### Fine Grained Authorization Enable user collaboration and granular access control in your apps using developer-friendly APIs. Learn more](https://auth0.com/fine-grained-authorization)

`Javascript``iOS (Swift)``Android (Kotlin)``Angular`

Copied to clipboard

```javascript
const login = async () => {
  await auth0.loginWithRedirect({
    redirect_uri: window.location.origin
  });
};
```

### Implement Auth0 in any application in just 5 minutes

With a few lines of code you can have Auth0 integrated in any app written in any language, and any framework. We provide 30+ SDKs & Quickstarts to help you succeed on your implementation.

Identity is so much more than just the login box
------------------------------------------------

Let’s take a look at everything you can do.

B2B SaaSRetailFinancial ServicesPublishingTravelHealthcare

Design for security and convenience. Delegate access for B2B2C SaaS services. Incorporate an organizational portal, access controls, and multiple extensions.

![Image 63: Registration](https://cdn.auth0.com/website/cic-homepage/industriesFlow/edit.svg)Registration

Bot Detection

Provisioning

![Image 64: Login](https://cdn.auth0.com/website/cic-homepage/industriesFlow/login.svg)Login

Enterprise Federation
